tool_description: This endpoint transcodes/converts & compresses animated image files like gifs to WebP format (it keeps the animation while compressing). It can compress 100 times original files and 3-5 times compressed files This endpoint is referenced as "A2" in our Postman collection. We provide very detailed documentation there. Please check our postman documentation for full info. There is also Axios example in tutorials.
name: Gif Animated Photo Optimisation / Transcoder (Download Url)
title: Gif Animated Photo Optimisation / Transcoder (Download Url)
tool_name: Gif Animated Photo Optimisation / Transcoder (Download Url)

api_list.name: A2- Single ANIMATED PHOTO || Transcode Single File && Return Download Url
api_list.description:
- This endpoint only accepts one source and one target. If you pass multiple values, then it will fail.
- The code of this endpoint "A2" in our postman collection. You can find more details there. 
- Please check "C6" and "E6" if you want to pass multiple source and/or target.
- Please read the "introduction" section in the document for more info on our docs.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gif-animated-photo-optimisation-transcoder-download-url.p.rapidapi.com/apifsp/transcoder/generate-download-link/animated-photo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gif-animated-photo-optimisation-transcoder-download-url.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

print(response.json())
